 #Abstract
 
 Here I examine the analysis of Oeppen and Vaupel (2002)
 again
 
 #Life Expectancy Analysis
 - I have added some comments and even more comments 
 

```{r}
library(gapminder)
library(tidyverse)
```
 
 
```{r}
data <-data(gapminder_unfiltered)
View(gapminder_unfiltered)
```
 
```{r}
library(dplyr)
gapminder_unfiltered %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  filter(lifeExp== max(lifeExp)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  select(year, country, lifeExp) %>%
  arrange(year) -> 
  sumdat 
```
